name: Tomb of the Snake King
description:
Tomb of the Snake King was created from scratch for Zeno Game Jam 3. The theme for the Jam was "It Never Ends". ToSK is a rogue-like snake-like. Venture into the Tomb of the Snake King to collect his cursed treasure - it follows you around like a snake! Make sure and dodge mummies, scarabs and even the walls as you make your way through the tomb, gathering gold!

Plays best in expanded mode (click the blue arrows on the bottom right of the game window, once you click run).
